title: My Sex Dolly’s Are Saving The World.
body:
For the past ten years I’ve been making and selling sex dolly’s for one soul purpose, to save the world. You might not think this is life saving but I will explain further later. Now my sex dolly’s are not your average fleshy delights that you can find on the internet by any means. Mine are special and as such I only supply to a select few

I got the idea when my daughter came to work on a, “bring your daughter to work day.” I can’t actually tell you what I do for a living, but I can say that at that particular time I was experimenting on a new molecular substance for the government, the substance - let’s called it Compound C-O-3-11-R-15-20 - had the same consistency as the lubricant used for sexual experiences.

As labs can be quite dangerous places, we only went down there for a few minutes at the end of the day, just to show my little four year-old girl the cooler part of my job and the badass equipment that we use.

That night I sat and watched the TV after dinner and was shocked when the news anchor told us a recent static. The child-sex attack rate had sore in the past two years and the government were at ends to stop it, so as a new law and deterrent, anyone caught for a sexual related crime was to be put on a sex offender list. Good, I though.

Anyways. The next day I found my daughter’s dolly left on the table in my laboratory, and it got me thinking. If I could cross a flesh light sex toy with my daughter’s dolly I could make a whole new sex doll for the pedophiles out there to use in place of real children.

Now, before you get out your pitchforks and overreact let me explain my reasoning. I don’t do this for money and what money I get after materials and deliveries goes to children’s charities to help fight the real monsters out there. I do this because, I theorised that by supplying what these prevented scummy bastards needed, it would stop them from snatching our children and destroying the young lives of numerous innocents.

And I’m pleased to announce that I was correct. Within my first year of manufacturing these sex dolly's the child-sex attack rate in my city alone dropped by four percent. It’s wasn’t a lot but it was working. The second year I estimated a drop of double that at fifteen percent.

I told a few of my good friends and started to distribute to them in different cities, and over the years that network has grown. Now I - I mean - we, have collectively supplied over one hundred thousand sex dollys to the low life’s that needed them the most and have recorded a overall dropped of fourth-seven percent in a 150 mile radio within our areas.

It’s funny how these life changing ideas can come from obscure places. Just a on market sex toy, a child’s dolly and my gel like lubricant that once exposed to air will eat through steel.

Like I said. I’ve been sending my sex dollys to those who need them the most and they’ve been saving the world.
